tool_description: Created to give AI recomendations for movies & shows just like watchnow.
name: WatchThis
title: WatchThis

api_list.name: tv
api_list.description:
Welcome to the documentation for the WatchThis TV Shows Recommending API. This API allows you to fetch details about specific TV shows and recommends related shows based on genres, vote averages, and other criteria.

Ids are seperated by `,` like `id1,id2,id3`

api_list.name: movie
api_list.description:
Welcome to the documentation for the WatchThis Movie's Recommending API. This API allows you to fetch details about specific shows or movies and recommends related shows based on genres and vote averages.

Ids are seperated by `,` like `id1,id2,id3`
